description: Try our easy to follow Baked Cheese Fondue recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cheese fondue,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Baked Cheese Fondue Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp thyme, chopped, plus 3 extra (to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Put the Camembert on a baking sheet lined with foil. Drizzle over the oil and honey and scatter over the thyme and salt and pepper to taste.
Bake in a preheated oven, 200°C, Gas Mark 6, for 12-15 minutes until the cheese is sizzling and ready to burst through the skin.
Carefully transfer to a platter and serve with the bread, tomatoes and fruit to dip into the oozing cheese.
